prototypes.prototype: .GetItem as L (BYREF Data as B, BYREF ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)
.GetItem as L (BYREF Data as C, BYREF ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)

page.description: Retrieves an item from the container using the name you provide. The content type is also returned.
page.discussion: You must dimension the resulting Data variable and the ContentType variable prior to making the call.
